conclusion: A falls freely from above due to gravity.
There are several blocks positioned below A.
A will follow the path of least resistance, which is directly downward due to gravity.
The block directly below A is the closest object in its path, so A will collide with it first.
Upon collision, A will likely come to rest on top of the block due to the force of the impact and the stability of the block.
The other blocks surrounding the one directly below A are not in its direct path, so they will not be affected by the collision.
A will land on top of the block directly below it.
